resources.string: In this game, you are robot (#). Your job is to find kitten. This task is complicated by the existence of various things which are not kitten. Robot must touch items to determine if they are kitten or not. The game ends when robotfindskitten. Alternatively, you may end the game by hitting the Back key.
Press the scroll wheel to start.
Way to go, robot! You found kitten!
Press the scroll wheel to play again or Back to quit.

Use the scroll wheel or directional pad to move. Touchscreen support coming soon!
 
Credits

http://staticfree.info/projects/rfk/
 
Original version by Leonard Richardson
http://www.crummy.com/ 
written originally for the Nerth Pork robotfindskitten contest and licensed under the GNU GPL.
 
Icon artwork by Sarah Morrison
http://tashari.org/
 
Want robotfindskitten for your toaster? See http://robotfindskitten.org/ for other versions!
